          Starts a Session by logging a user in.
 void ControllerFacade.logout()
          Logs the user out, invalidates the Session.
 boolean ControllerFacade.authorize(Session session, MOIdentifier mOId, Action action)
          MUST NOT BE CALLED FROM THE CLIENT (is called by the MediaProxy).

          Returns the InputOptions the user has to insert mediadata.
 OutputOption[] ControllerFacade.getOutputOptions(MOIdentifier mo)
          Returns the OutputOptions for the user for the given moID.
 ConnectionAddress ControllerFacade.prepareInsert(ProtocolId protocolId, MetaData metaData)
          Prepares the system for the input of media-data.
 ConnectionAddress ControllerFacade.prepareOutput(MOIdentifier mo, OutputOption oo)
          Prepares the system to output media-data.

          Sets metadata for a media-object.
 MetaDataAccess ControllerFacade.getMetaData(MOIdentifier mOId)
          Returns MetaData to the given moid.
 boolean ControllerFacade.deleteMediaObject(MOIdentifier mOId)
          Deletes a media-object.
 SearchResult[] ControllerFacade.search(SearchCriteria search)
          Searches in the DB for the given SearchCriteria.
 AdminResult ControllerFacade.administration(AdminOperation operation)
          Executes a administrative command which is given as an AdminOperation.
 EditJobIdentifier ControllerFacade.getEditJob(MOIdentifier mo)
          Get a EditJob for the given media-object.
 ResourceRequestIdentifier ControllerFacade.requestResources(Session session, MOIdentifier moid, FormatId fId, ProtocolId protocolId, Action action)
          MUST NOT BE CALLED FROM THE CLIENT (is called by the MediaProxy).
 void ControllerFacade.releaseResource(ResourceRequestIdentifier request)
          MUST NOT BE CALLED FROM THE CLIENT (is called by the MediaProxy).
